description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=1/3, Mature Content=0/3. Local multi-player party game featuring 2-4 Sumo's attempting to sit on each others heads! Features free for all, team play and tag based game modes across 16 arenas taking alternative Sumo wrestling to a whole new level.
